actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

actions.in_subcommittee: National Parks, Forests and Public Lands

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands

official_title: To direct the Secretary of the Interior to make matching contributions toward the purchase of the Sterling Forest in the State of New York, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to make matching contributions to: (1) the Palisades Interstate Park Commission for the acquisition of Sterling Forest, New York; and (2) Passaic County, New Jersey, toward the outstanding amount owed for certain lands, as specified in the consent judgment in County of Passaic against MPS Corporation, Sterling Forest Corporation, and Sterling Forest Development Corporation.

titles.title: To direct the Secretary of the Interior to make matching contributions toward the purchase of the Sterling Forest in the State of New York, and for other purposes.
